Fax number, Website Adress, Opening and closing hours,
Slot duration, Maximum number of vaccines that can be given per slot)
createVaccinationCenter(Name, Adress, Phone number, Email, Type of Vaccine,
Fax number, Website Adress, Opening and closing hours,
